Title: Overcoming addictions
Text: To have a clear mind, we first need to understand our addictions and overcome them.

Title: Building a resilient mindset
Text: After understanding what prevents us from overcoming our difficulties, we need to start building our resilient mindset.

Title: Starting a realistic change
Text: Now, we must be realistic and understand that having a resilient mindset is not that simple, and that we must start slowly.

Title: Turning nothing into something
Text: It is true that many times, we are overcome by our own procastination and laziness, we will understand how to overcome this immense obstacle.

Title: Overcoming fears
Text: The great enemy of anyone who wants to start developing is fear. we will explore why we are afraid of change and how to deal with this fear.

Title: Small steps, big achievements
Text: Even a plane needs to start slowly to take off into the skies...
